products.title: Kerry Boysenberry Roller Blind
products.description: This gorgeous purple is what you would imagine the king of the aubergines to be. Royal and dignified, but with a restraint that shows his benevolence, he is the most beloved of all the vegetable kings. All his magnificence is present in this blind, from the rich colour that diplomatically cooperates with a variety of palette and decor designs to the steadfast defense of his realm from harsh sunlight that fades sofas and melts ice cream.

products.title: Kerry Fresh Strawberry Roller Blind
products.description: The colour you see when you get cut off at an intersection, the gorgeous kerry fresh strawberry is a physical manifestation of that burning anger that just feels so damn good. Ideal for rooms rocking warm colours, like other reds, oranges and browns, you could also use it to heat up a cooler colour palette and add some fire to your life. Being blackout as well, it gives you total darkness and privacy as you smash lamps and write angry reviews of restaurants on yelp.

Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. products.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
